==== New Form Wizard
:doctype: article
:revnumber: {project-version}
include::_initDoc.adoc[]

//fallback for safe mode == secure:
ifndef::imgsdir[:imgsdir: ../../../../imgs]
ifndef::codedir[:codedir: ../../../../../code]
ifndef::mdledir[:mdledir: ../../../../adoc]
:experimental:

The _New Form_ wizard is be used to create a new form and related classes such as the form data class and a related service class.
To start the wizard use menu:File[New,Other...] or press Ctrl+N.
In the first wizard step type _Scout_ into the search field to restrict the result list to the creation of new Scout components.

image::{imgsdir}/sdk_new_form.png[]
